TopicTitle: Controlling the ship from a plugin.

Articles.Content:
I'm pretty sure I've read this somewhere, but I cannot find it anymore. There was some way to inject control commands into your current ship so you could control it from a plugin.

I've been trying to get control of the throttle, but everything I try doesn't work. So I just want to send throttle key presses and be done with it.
Thanks! Exactly the page I could not find.
Is there a way to directly control RCS thrusters?
RCS thrusters would be the Z, X, Y fields in your fly-by-wire.
